Detailed Description

The class represent a page in a wiki system. It has most of the attributes as described in the MediaWiki API. If the page ID is equal to '-1', the page is not existing.

Author:
Dian
Version:
0.1

Definition at line 120 of file Page.php.

PCPPage::toXML (  ) 

Converts the object to an XML node.

Example: <page title="title" pageid="4611" ns ="namespace" bt="basetimestamp" lrid="3" urid="2">
<text>The text on the page.</text>
<summary>The summary of the last change made.</summary> </page>

Returns:
string The XML node.
